name: Tour of museums
description:
Immerse yourself in a journey to discover the museums that the city of Milan offers.
We start with the "Pinacoteca di Brera" to discover classical art, then we move to the "Museo del Novecento" to view the works of that century, then we move from the "Mudec" to be inspired by modern art. Finally, the tour allows you to be amazed by the inventions of Leonardo in the "National Science and Technology Museum".

name: Tour of theaters
description:
Every year in Milan there are many events, from classic shows to underground concerts.
This tour allows you to visit the places where these events take place.
The first stage is the theater "La Scala" which is one of the most important theaters in Italy, where timeless performances are acted.
Then we move on to the "Piccolo Teatro", an important venue for many events and concerts in the city.
The tour ends at the "Circolo Magnolia" a park near the idroscalo where events are organized that, for the variety it has, generates interest at any age.

name: Tour of churches
description:
Milan is full of churches. They are found along every road and are so numerous that you almost do not notice anymore.
We wanted to prepare this short itinerary that will take you to discover the churches of Milan to visit absolutely. I only chose 5 of the most beautiful, curious and mysterious of the city.
How can you not stop for a few minutes to contemplate the facade of the Duomo di Milano? The first stop of the tour is very easy to find, after all, the cathedral is one of the most beautiful churches in Milan.
Then we move on to the church of San Mzurizio, where although the exterior is decidedly sober, entering we can not hold back an exclamation of wonder.
The next stop is the "Basilica di Sant'Ambrogio" where the architecture and the beautiful internal cloister will surprise even the most skeptical.
Booking in advance in the next stage you can see one of the most beautiful works of Leonardo Da Vinci, "the Cenacle", in the church of "Santa Maria delle Grazie".
The tour ends with the "Cimitero Monumentale" where you can see wonderful structures.

name: Discover MI in a Weekend
description:
If you want to discover the main attractions of Milan we offer a tour suitable for a weekend trip in the capital of Lombardy.
The stages that make up this tour allow you to see the major attractions that the city has to offer.
The first day starts with a tour of the historic center to see the "Duomo", the "Galleria Vittorio Emanuele II".
The second junction instead passes through "Parco Sempione" also visiting the "Castello Sforzesco", then ending with an evening walk on the "Navigli".
The last day you pass through "Piazza Affari" and the "Cimitero Monumentale", the tour ends with a dinner at the "Mercato Centrale" where you can choose your meal among the various stands.

name: Discover MI in a day
description:
If you want to discover the main attractions of Milan we offer a tour suitable for a day trip in the capital of Lombardy.
The stages that make up this tour allow you to see the major attractions that the city has to offer.

Then you pass through the beautiful  "Sempione Park" where you can immerse yourself in nature and relax, and then conclude with an evening walk on the "Navigli".
